GisXmlSkipElementHandler Class Reference

#include <SkipElementHandler.h>

Inherits GisDisposable, and GisXmlSaxHandler.

Inheritance diagram for GisXmlSkipElementHandler:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

GisXmlSkipHandler can be used to skip an XML element, when reading an XML document via GisXmlReader. It is a GisXmlSaxHandler with no callback implementations. Therefore, if another GisXmlSaxHandler's XmlStartElement callback returns a GisXmlSkipElementHandler then there are no more SAX events until the end of the current element is reached.
